text: Has anybody ever used Auth0 (<https://auth0.com/>) on a HubSpot CMS site? I'm looking at the docs and can't figure out if you can use it entirely in-browser to authenticate a user or not

Oh, i imagine you could do that.
if you’re just passing it to a form

i’d imagine the flow will be
1. user clicks button to authenticate
2. redirected to auth0 to signup/login
3. returned to HubSpot page with appended access token/uid
4. library checks authentication / readprofile details
